articles.title: 8-year-old girl dies in Border Patrol custody in Texas, as agency struggles with overcrowding - The Associated Press
articles.description: MCALLEN, Texas (AP) — A little girl from Panama born with heart problems died in Border Patrol custody Wednesday, the second death of a child  from Latin America in U.S.
articles.content: MCALLEN, Texas (AP) A little girl from Panama born with heart problems died in Border Patrol custody Wednesday, the second death of a child from Latin America in U.S. government custody in two weeks.… [+5178 chars]

articles.author: Marc Lallanilla
articles.title: Lesbians, gay men face very different heart disease risks: US cardiac experts - New York Post
articles.description: New American Heart Association research has revealed the complex relationship between sexuality and the risk factors for cardiovascular diseases and other health conditions.
articles.content:
Women who identify as lesbian or bisexual may have a greater risk for heart disease, according to a new study by the American Heart Association (AHA).
